name: Kingsmill Resort: River Course
description: The jewel of Kingsmill, this Pete Dye design borders the James River and has hosted numerous PGA and LPGA events. Known for its challenging finishing holes and winds off the river.

holes.desc: Signature par-3 playing along the James River.
Famous finishing hole with water guarding the entire left side.

name: Kingsmill Resort: Plantation Course
description: Designed by Arnold Palmer and Ed Seay, this course favors accurate iron play. It features historical landmarks from the 1736 plantation and generous fairways with water coming into play on eight holes.

name: Royal New Kent
description: 'Golf Ireland in Virginia'. A Mike Strantz masterpiece offering a rugged, windswept Irish links experience with 105 bunkers and dramatic elevation changes.
